author: Unity
description:
Unity 6, you can easily select a specific object in the scene view using the new piercing menu. Instead of clicking multiple times to select the correct object, simply hold the control or command button and right-click to open a piercing menu that shows a list of all the selectable game objects at this position.

Find more free Unity learn resources:
https://learn.unity.com/

#gamedev #unitytips #unity3d #unitylearn
title: Unity Tip Tuesday: Editor piercing menu

author: Unity
description:
This video provides a high-level overview of Unity Asset Transformer, a suite of tools designed to help you convert, optimize, and automate your 3D data pipelines. Learn about the different products – Transformer Studio, Transformer Toolkit, and Transformer SDK – and see which one is the right fit for your specific workflow.

This overview covers:
Core Capabilities: Learn how Asset Transformer is used to convert any 3D file type (CAD, BIM, point cloud), optimize complex models for real-time performance, and automate data preparation.
Choosing the Right Tool: Understand the key differences and ideal use cases for the Studio, Toolkit, and SDK.

Component Breakdown:
Transfer Studio: Interactively convert, prepare, and optimize your CAD/3D models, whatever their source, size, or complexity, for real-time and visualization needs. Leverage the integrated Python interface to streamline repetitive and complex tasks.
Toolkit: Seamlessly integrate your existing data with Unity. Import any 3D or
title: Unity Asset Transformer - Getting Started with Unity for Industry
